title: Multilingual GitHub Scraper Output
description: AI-powered analysis results for GitHub files and issues. Returns explanations, flowcharts (Mermaid.js), and solution plans in 20+ languages. Supports four modes: file_explainer (AI file analysis), issue_solver (AI issue solutions), file (raw file data), and issue (raw issue data).
